Question
========

In an ANOVA, the main effects of Factor A and B are included in the model. The research study has an unbalanced design, such that the overlap below is observed. What part of the explained variance of Y is assigned to Factor B if Type I sum of squares are used with Factor B included in the model first?

![](vufgb-anova-003-en-venndiagram01.jpg)
  
Answerlist
----------
* 4 + 5 + 6
* 4 + 7
* 4 + 6
* 4

Solution
========

Answerlist

* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
